__e: Look, um, I just talked to my friend. He's a, um... nurse in the infirmary. And, um, well, I don't know if you know this or not.
What you're doing up there in the infirmary, what it's got to do with what we're doing here?
By God, just coming out of the ward was enough for me to get well.
- What's he doing in a jail Infirmary?
They took him to the prison infirmary, but it was too late.
You get me out of Sick Bay, so you're free to give my patient a tonsillectomy.

I thought you were in real trouble, but they wouldn't let me see you, so I asked a friend of mine who works in the infirmary to check on you, and ten minutes ago he told me that he's pretty damn sure you were gone for at least three hours.
Good. lf you don't mind, I'd like you to remain in Sick Bay, so you're here when he wakes up.
